info.name: Android Police - V O I D
info.description: A true black theme for androidpolice.com Tested only on FireFox. If you find anything's out of order or missing, comment here or at GitHub Gist
info.additionalInfo:
27.05.2018
-Option to remove the sidebar and centre the post
26.05.2018
-Initial release

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("androidpolice.com") {
body,
a,
.ap-follow-btn .ap-sidebar-title,
ul.share-btns,
ul.post-list h3,
#message,
.drop-down ul.sub-cat li a,
.drop-down .more-btn,
ul.sub-nav li a,
.fs-control,
ul.sub-nav li a:hover {
    color: #ddd
}

.drop-down .more-btn:hover {
    color: #fff
}

ul.sub-nav li a,
.fs-control {
    color: #999
}

ul.post-list h3 span {
    color: #ec3131
}

.band.content.main,
.band.header,
.band.footer,
.note-note,
#message,
ul.news-articles>li,
.drop-down ul.sub-cat,
#news-slider,
.drop-down .more-btn,
.fs-navigation,
.ap-panel-news,
.drop-down,
.drop-down .container,
.ap-dropdown-content,
.EmbeddedTweet,
.post .post-content tr:nth-child(2n) td,
.tip-us-header,
.tip-us-body,
.tip-us-iframe-body,
.ap-loader,
.gallery-display,
.gallery-slider,
.btn.left,
.btn.right,
.note-warning,
blockquote.pr,
div.wpappbox,
div.wpappbox div.appicon {
    background: #010101;
}
    
div.wpappbox div.applinks, div.wpappbox.compact a.applinks {
    background-color: #010101 !important
}

.primary .post-footer-inner,
.single-post-widget .post-list,
.post,
#sbar .widget section,
.textarea-wrapper,
ul.share-btns li .share-btn,
.band.sub-nav,
.wp-pagenavi,
.ap-nav-wrapper,
.author-box-page {
    background: #0c0c0c;
}

.post,
#sbar .widget section,
.textarea-wrapper,
.primary .post-footer,
ul.share-btns li,
.share-box .shares span.count,
.categories li a,
.wp-pagenavi,
.author-box-page,
.author-widget .post-list,
.horizontal-boxes li,
#message,
.EmbeddedTweet,
.MediaCard-borderOverlay,
.EmbeddedTweet--mediaForward .EmbeddedTweet-tweet,
.gallery-display,
div.wpappbox,
div.wpappbox div.appicon,
div.wpappbox div.applinks, div.wpappbox.compact a.applinks {
    border: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
    box-shadow: none;
}

.card-action,
.categories,
.band.sub-nav,
.drop-down .more-btn,
.fs-navigation {
    border-top: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
}

.cell-wrapper,
.band.sub-nav,
.single-post-widget .widget,
ul.news-articles>li,
.post .post-content th,
.post .post-content td,
.post .post-content tr:last-child td,
blockquote.pr footer {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
}

.card-action,
.categories,
.categories ul.post-categories,
.post .post-content th,
.post .post-content td,
blockquote.pr section,
blockquote.pr footer {
    border-left: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
}

.single-post-widget .post-list,
.drop-down #article-list ul.news-articles,
.naag-slider .slides>li,
.naag-slider .slides>li:nth-child(2n),
.fs-control-prev,
.fs-control-filters,
.post .post-content th,
.post .post-content td,
.post .post-content tr td:last-child,
blockquote.pr section,
blockquote.pr footer {
    border-right: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
}

.post .post-content a:not(.read-more):not(.btn):not(.banner):not(.no-style) {
    border-bottom: none
}

.post-footer .article-nav {
    display: none
}

h1.logo {
    background: url(https://i.imgur.com/ztyiWnV.png?nocache=1) no-repeat;
}
/*[[sbrmv]]*/
}
